attributes.additional_details: What are we paying MPs for? NOT DOING THE JOB THEY WERE ELECTED FOR!!
attributes.background: Too many  MPs are resigning  and not honouring their constituents.every other person in the country when resigning has to leave their  jobs without pay.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
